item.title: Rant in the Shell
item.description: I’ve just came home from watching the new Ghost in the Shell movie. Here is a somewhat spoilery rant I have to get off my chest. Still reading? Good. Gloves off from now on. This movie is an insult to the original anime. Maybe I will soften up after a few days but right now I have really strong feelings against this film. Bad adaptation work The 2017 Ghost in the Shell is an average action flick and a really bad adaptation.
